nodes.text: Teta was a former duke from the Empress Teta system.

Due to countless medical treatments and organ transplants, Teta achieved a greatly extended lifetime, reaching the age of 300 standard years when he attended the Squid Lake performance at the Galaxies Opera House. He married the young Twi'lek Koyi Mateil for her looks – she married him hoping he would soon die and leave her his fortune.

Teta first appeared in Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, which was released on May 19, 2005. The character's name was first revealed by the reference book Dressing a Galaxy: The Costumes of Star Wars, which was written by Trisha Biggar and released on October 1, 2005.
